Red Infantry
Unique Unit for the Bolsheviks. Replaces the Great War Infantry. Weaker (46 Combat Strength vs 50). +25% Attack bonus on Railroads. Starts with the Patriotic War promotion.
Red Infantry
Though it comes late in the game, the Red Infantry can be plenty useful for holding off invasions. The Red Infantry gains a combat bonus while fighting on Railroad tiles, so a good means of keeping your units strong is to plop them on any tile with a Railroad. You may wish to also send a Worker with the Red Infantry in case you need to repair any pillaged Railroad tiles.
